html: Look upon Zion "Thou shalt see Zion"—, For ,חזה , chazeh, "see," read ,תחזה , techezeh, "thou shalt see," with the Chaldee. - Houbigant. At the end of this verse we find in the Masoretic Bibles this note, ,הספר חצי , chatsi hassepher, "the middle of the book;" that is the middle of the book of Isaiah.
